body_text:
Luffy as a water balloon We discussed a lot about drowning devil fruit users in a bath - see this question: Can a devil fruit user drown in a bathtub?. 
So now I remembered the fight between Luffy and Crocodile. To have a chance, Luffy drank a lot of water and was like a water ballon. But why didn't this affect his strength?
Does he have to be surrounded by water?
Can a Devil Fruit user drown in a bathtub? If a Devil Fruit user goes to a bathtub full of water or gets into a spa, will he drown?
